info.description: Search API to find results across multiple Search-engines like Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo
info.name: Search API

item.description: Search Bing and get results in a unified JSON format.
item.name: Search Bing

query.description:
**Required if token is not set**

Any Keywords to get results from.

**Required if token is not set**

Country code from what country the results are from.

**Allowed format**

^[A-Za-z]{2}$

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to the search-engine, will return everything by default.

**Optional**

Filter sensitive content, is moderate by default.

**Allowed values**

off, moderate or strict

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

response.name: Successful response

item.description: Search Yahoo-Japan and get results in a unified JSON format.
item.name: Search Yahoo Japan

query.description:
**Required if token is not set**

Any Keywords to get results from.

**Optional**

The maximum age of when a result was added to the search-engine, will return everything by default.

**Optional**

Filter by only japanese results, is set to `false` by default

**Allowed values**

false or true

**Optional**

Pagination token from previous response as the `meta.nextToken` to get the next batch of results.

response.name: Successful response
